trans-unit.source: Uninstall the tool and add to the local tool manifest.
trans-unit.target: Uninstall the tool and add to the local tool manifest.

trans-unit.source: Only the local option(--local) support manifest file option (--tool-manifest).
trans-unit.target: Only the local option(--local) support manifest file option (--tool-manifest).

trans-unit.source: The NuGet Package Id of the tool to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 要卸载的工具的 NuGet 包 ID。

trans-unit.source: Uninstall a global tool or local tool.
trans-unit.target: 从当前开发环境中卸载工具。

trans-unit.source: Please specify one tool Package Id to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 请指定一个要卸载的工具包 ID。

trans-unit.source: Uninstall the tool from the current user's tools directory.
trans-unit.target: 从当前用户的工具目录中卸载该工具。

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' has multiple versions installed and cannot be uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 工具“{0}”已安装多个版本，无法卸载。

trans-unit.source: Cannot have options: {0}. The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the tool path option (--tool-path), can only have one at a time. Please specify only one of the options.
trans-unit.target: Cannot have options: {0}. The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the tool path option (--tool-path), can only have one at a time. Please specify only one of the options.

trans-unit.source: The directory containing the tool to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 包含要卸载的工具的目录。
